option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --stage finetune --seed_everything 0 --max_epochs 400 --batch_size 16 --ckpt_path Experiment/R101_train_400/tensorboard_fit/checkpoints/last.ckpt --accelerator gpu --strategy ddp --devices 5 6 7 8 --check_val_every_n_epoch 1 --log_every_n_steps 10 --experiment_name R102_finetuneR101_400 --version finetune --ckpt_every_n_epochs 50 --tqdm_refresh_rate 20 --data_index_file ../Datasets/UIHNJMuL/cls_folds/fold0.json --data_root ../Datasets/UIHNJMuL --sample_weight_key nobbps bbps0 bbps1 bbps2 bbps3 --sample_weight_value 0 0 0 10000 10000 --resize_shape 224 224 --brightness_jitter 0.8 --contrast_jitter 0.8 --saturation_jitter 0.8 --num_workers 16 --num_heads 8 --attention_lambda 0.3 --thresh 0.5 --lr 0.00001 --momentum 0.9 --weight_decay 0.0001 --cls_weight 10.0 --outside_acc_thresh 0.9 --nonsense_acc_thresh 0.9
